options.description: tab group to move, if this is not specified, default is current tab group

options.name: toLeftOfTab
options.description: destination tab to move to left of, if the tab is in a group, the source tab group will be moved to the left of tab group of the destination tab

options.name: window
options.description: window to rearrange tabs, if this is not specified, default is current window
